titles: VVits priuate vvealth Stored with choise commodities to content the minde.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Printed by Edw. Allde, for Iohn Tappe, and are to be solde at his shop at St. Magnus corner,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Aphorisms and apothegms --  Early works to 1800.
